name: GetCampaignReports
description:
Retrieve detailed campaign reports from Mailchimp.

This tool retrieves campaign performance reports from Mailchimp Marketing. It should be called when detailed analytics about email campaigns are needed, such as open rates, click rates, and other metrics.

parameters.name: included_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields_list
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude from the report. Use dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: number_of_records_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to return, ranging from 10 to 1000. Default is 10.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip for pagination. Default is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: campaign_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of campaign to retrieve reports for. Valid options are dependent on Mailchimp's supported campaign types.

parameters.name: restrict_to_campaigns_sent_before
parameters.description: Restrict response to campaigns sent before this ISO 8601 time format (e.g., 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00).

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to campaigns sent before the set time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: restrict_to_campaigns_sent_after
parameters.description: Restrict the response to campaigns sent after the specified ISO 8601 date and time.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to campaigns sent after the set time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: before_send_time
parameters.description: Restrict the response to campaigns sent before the set time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to campaigns sent before the set time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: since_send_time
parameters.description: Restrict the response to campaigns sent after the set time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to campaigns sent after the set time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
